text:
Hi folks, Need your suggestion/help.
Facing one issue with GDPR, can we remove the required field?
If the user does not want to fill additional fields for it.
Suggestion and help are most welcomed. Thanks in advance.
Hello, is there currently a non technical way to embed a form in a blog post? (not editing the source)
Also is there any discussion around amp pages and the flexibility with them? It would be great to have forms rendered or a navigation button in the header
Yes, you can copy and paste the form embedded code
